consultation.chief_complaint: Burning urination, lower abdominal pain, fatigue
consultation.examination: Temperature 37.8Â°C, suprapubic tenderness, signs of dehydration
consultation.notes: Patient has type 2 diabetes. Currently taking Metformin. Higher risk of infection and delayed healing.

treatment_plan.instructions: Drink plenty of water. Monitor blood sugar closely. Stop medication and contact doctor if severe diarrhea or rash occurs.

medications.name: Ciprofloxacin
medications.warning: May affect blood sugar levels in diabetic patients.

medications.name: Paracetamol
medications.warning: Avoid exceeding recommended dose to prevent liver damage.

medications.name: Metformin
medications.warning: Monitor kidney function. Interaction risk with Ciprofloxacin.

risk_flags: Blood sugar may fluctuate during antibiotic therapy
